# Skills

These skills are reusable tasks for agents.

## add-api-endpoint
- Add an endpoint in apps/api/Codec.Api
- Include validation and tests if applicable
- Update docs/ARCHITECTURE.md and docs/FEATURES.md

## add-svelte-route
- Add a route in apps/web/src/routes
- Connect to the API via PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL
- Update docs/FEATURES.md

## update-docs
- Update PLAN.md status
- Update relevant docs in /docs

## verify-changes
- Run local builds or describe how to run them
